title: More efficient logic is expected for processing disk sorting with a border value for row value
OB: When sorting on disk, if we sort 40000 rows of data and set the program to process the data less than 40000, the current behavior is as follows: 1.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Sort the data on disk. 2. Set the program to process the data less than 40000. 3. Observe the following steps: a. The file is saved as a temporary file. b. The file is called into memory. c. The data is sorted. d. The file is saved as a temporary file.
